publisher: Rochester Institute of Technology MAGIC Spell Studios
intro:
Idol Hell is the beginner friendly bullet hell game! 
Play as Medli and fight through hoards of enemies and meet vibrant cute bosses through 4 different difficulties!
description:
What is Idol Hell?
Idol Hell is a 2D, Touhou-like, Shoot 'em up, bullet hell game taking inspiration from Japanese school idols and anime tropes.

In Idol Hell, you play as Medli, a robot schoolgirl idol set on a warpath to free her closest friend.
Fight through hordes of enemies and other cutesy robot idols in this vibrant, precision-based game.

The Full Game Includes:
4 Difficulty Levels!
4 Different Game Modes to Play!
6 Chapters!
7 Cute Robot Idols!
14 Songs Filled With Variety!
Hundreds Of Bullet Patterns!
